TODO Page

Introduction

If you feel in the mood to enjoy some C code, on this page, you can find a list a things to do to improve this library.

Todo list

  • Implement new combination rules (PCR5/6, Florea, etc...)
  • Implement new applicative modules
  • Implement other theories (multi-frame functions, continuous belief function, DSmT, etc...)
  • Add some tools to build belief functions (randomly, from certain files, from statistics, etc...)
  • Write a tutorial page explaining the basics of the theory and how to start using the library.
